TEST_PAGE.TITLE: Test page
TEST_PAGE.NOT_LOGGED: Anyone can access this page, even without logging in.
TEST_PAGE.ADMIN: Only administrators can access this page.
TEST_PAGE.USER: Only users can access this page.
TEST_PAGE.ANY_ROLE: Both users and administrators can access this page.

GUARD.LOGIN_REQUIRED: You need to be logged in to access this page
GUARD.NOT_AUTHORIZED: Your credentials do not allow you access to this page
